historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-1442.

1973 Ed., § 1-1161.1.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-1, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-1101.01.

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-88, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-1101.01.

For Law 17-353, see notes following § 1-129.05.

Miscellaneous Notes

Applicability of chapter to Law 11-144: Section 4 of D.C. Law 11-144, the Contribution Limitation Initiative Amendment Act of 1996, provided that D.C. Code § 1-1101.01 et seq. shall apply to the act. D.C. Law 11-144 repeals § 1- 1104.01 and amends §§ 1-1131.01, 1-1131.03, and 1-1104.02.

DC CODE § 1-1104.02

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Election Campaigns; Lobbying; Conflict of Interest. [Repealed]
